title: Sarcastic Robot: Monospaced Handwriting font
content:
Almost ready to release my new sarcastic robot font.  
It's a monospaced, fixed-wdth font, but it's also a handwriting font and it is fun, too.  
Because programmers are always looking for an interesting new fixed-width font.  
Here's something a little different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419021207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sarcastic_robot_display_6348.gif)
author: chank
